import base64

def encode_text(input_text):
    ulysses = input_text.encode('')
    base64_bytes = base64.b64encode(ulysses)
    base64_text = base64_bytes.decode('utf-8')
    return base64_text

import base64

def encode_text(input_text):
    ulysses = input_text.encode('utf-8')
    base64_bytes = base64.b64encode(ulysses)
    base64_text = base64_bytes.decode('')
    return base64_text
